name: Traffic Racing (itch)
description:
Traffic Racing  

You can choose one of the fastest cars which suits you best, acceleration and brake capabilities.

You can get more credits and scores as long as you do not make accident along challenging highway, then you can use this credits 

to get new cars and modify them.

Game Features :

- You can choose different highways.

- You can play in "one way", “two way" and "speed way" modes.
